Thanks, incredible that this torrent has survived here since June 2006. The audio tracks stated are all in stereo. Subtitles are all 4 Nordic (not Icelandic) and Eng, Dutch, Port. In addition: Hebrew, Arabic (probably), Russian, Turkish and Greek. The MENU for the subs is incomplete, you have to choose them with the remote.
